content.query:
drop view gold.vw_trip_data_green

create view gold.vw_trip_data_green
AS

select result.filepath(1) as year, result.filepath(2) as month ,* from OPENROWSET(
    bulk 'gold/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
    data_source='nyc_taxi_src',
    format='PARQUET') with (borough varchar(15) '$.Borough',
    trip_date date,
    trip_day varchar(10),
    trip_day_weekend_ind char(1),
    card_trip_count int,
    cash_trip_count int,
    street_hail_trip_count int,
    dispatch_trip_count int,
    trip_distance float ,
    trip_duration int,
    fare_amount float)
    
    as result


    select * from gold.vw_trip_data_green
